UNITED STATES SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE         
COMMISSION Washington, D.C. 20549 FORM 6-K    
Report of Foreign Private Issuer Pursuant to  
Rule 13a-16or 15d-16under the Securities      
Exchange Act of 1934                          
                                              
  For the month of       Commission File      
  May,2024               Number:1-14678       
                                              
CANADIAN IMPERIAL BANK OF COMMERCE            
(Translation of registrant’s name into        
English) CIBC Square, 81 Bay Street Toronto,  
Ontario Canada M5J 0E7 (Address of principal  
executive offices) Indicate by check mark     
whether the registrant files or will file     
annual reports under cover of Form 20-For Form
40-F: Form 20-F ☐ Form 40-F ☒ The information 
contained in this report under “Management’s  
Discussion and Analysis” on pages 1-53 and    
“Interim Consolidated Financial Statements”,  
including the notes thereto on pages 54-78, is
incorporated by reference into Registration   
Statements on Form S-8File Nos. 333-130283,   
333-09874and 333-218913and Form F-3File Nos.  
333-219550, 333-220284, 333-272447,and        
333-273505. SIGNATURES Pursuant to the        
requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of
1934, the registrant has duly caused this     
report to be signed on its behalf by the      
undersigned, thereunto duly authorized.       
                                              
                       CANADIAN               
                       IMPERIAL   /s/         
  Date: May            BANK OF    Allison     
  30, 2024     By:     COMMERCE   Mudge       
 ──────────────────────────────────────────── 
               Name:              Allison     
                                  Mudge       
               Title:             Senior      
                                  Vice-Pres…
